Davis Rain Funnel Roof



This home, intended as inexpensive housing for farm workers, features an inverted roofline for collecting rainwater.
Taken Saturday, October 17, 2015, 03:28:41PM. Original image size: 3888x2592, 1.6Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS 40D, 1/800s@ F4, ISO 200, 17-40mm f/4L, 21mm (33mm equiv)
